bioconda.name: bioconductor-beclear
bioconda.summary: Correction of batch effects in DNA methylation data

biotools.summary: This tool provides some functions to detect and correct for batch effects in DNA methylation data. Its core function is based on latent factor models and can also be used to predict missing values in any other matrix containing real numbers.

bioschemas.name: BEclear
bioschemas.summary: This tool provides some functions to detect and correct for batch effects in DNA methylation data. Its core function is based on latent factor models and can also be used to predict missing values in any other matrix containing real numbers.
